tools.name: list_object_structures
tools.description: List available Maximo Object Structures (APIs) from the schema, with optional filtering.

filter.description: Search term to filter Object Structures by name or description

tools.name: get_schema_details
tools.description: Get the detailed field definitions (properties, types) for a specific Maximo Object Structure.

objectStructure.description: The name of the Object Structure (e.g., MXWO, MXASSET)

tools.name: query_maximo
tools.description: Query data from Maximo using the OSLC REST API.

objectStructure.description: The Object Structure to query (e.g., mxwo, mxasset)

where.description: OSLC where clause (e.g., status="APPR" and siteid="BEDFORD")

select.description: Comma-separated list of fields to select (e.g., wonum,description,status)

formatted.description: If true, returns a Carbon-styled HTML table instead of JSON (default: true)

tools.name: render_carbon_table
tools.description: Generates a beautiful Carbon Design System HTML table from Maximo data.

objectStructure.description: The Object Structure to query (e.g., mxwo, mxasset)

tools.name: render_carbon_details
tools.description: Generates a beautiful Carbon Design System detail view for a specific Maximo record.

where.description: OSLC where clause to find the unique record (e.g., wonum="1001")

tools.name: get_instance_details
tools.description: Introspect the Maximo instance to get context data (e.g., latest data dates, version).
